item.title: Maruti Suzuki India Ltd is Rated Buy
item.description: Maruti Suzuki India Ltd is rated Buy by MarketsMOJO, with this rating last updated on 22 December 2025. While the rating was revised on that date, the analysis and financial metrics discussed here reflect the stock's current position as of 28 December 2025, providing investors with an up-to-date view of the company’s fundamentals, returns, and market standing.
